translations: v.懒洋洋地躺着（或坐着、站着）；悬吊；把舌头（从牙齿间）伸出（等于 loll）；跌跌撞撞地走（或跑）

sentences.sentence: Clusters of young men lollop around the streets idly.
sentences.translation: 成群的年轻人大摇大摆地在街上闲逛。

sentences.sentence: Clusters of young men lollop around the streets idly. Many residents are wealthy retired military folk and those sustained by funds from relatives at work in the Gulf.
sentences.translation: 三三两两的年轻人在大街上游来荡去，很多居民是退役军官，很有钱，还有很多靠在海湾工作的亲友资助度日。
